title: My Nightmares Have Been Weird Lately
body:
All of them have been related to frustrations and/or fears.

I had a couple that were incredibly vivid about Solo Q where entire matches would be played out and I would feel frustrated in my sleep.

I had one where someone I have sorta a crush on said she was married and pregnant, then funnily enough I realized I had messaged the wrong person in the League client '>.>

I've had several where posts of mine were removed by the mods, sometimes resulting me in fearing a ban, sometimes resulting in me getting a permanent ban. 

Another was being shot from a pistol.

Wtf how do you stop these from happening? I used to get like, nightmares maybe once or twice a year.
